title: Cillian Rail
content:
I am wondering what font this is  
It’s a close up of Patrick Bateman’s business card in American Psycho,  
In the book/movie, they call it Cillian Rail.  
The numbers look close to Georgia, but there is a serif at the bottom of the 2 that is not there in Georgia.  
 [http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v188/edimusprime/PatrickBatemanBC.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090428164519/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v188/edimusprime/PatrickBatemanBC.jpg)

Thanks
author: tao

comments.content: It looks like Garamond No. 3 (Oldstyle numbers and small caps)
